channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report E-2024070439
item.description:
Report E-2024070439

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-19T18:15:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-27
  • City: BELLE
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that 3-quarts of UN1263 White Mylar Head Coating released from one (1) 5-gallon metal pail due to being punctured by other freight during transit. All material has dried. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller who felt comfortable cleaning the release with terminal-issued PPE available on-site.
